headline: Jack Dorsey Wants A Tax Exemption On Everyday Bitcoin Transactions — Cynthia Lummis Points Toward A Bill She Introduced
summary: Sen. Cynthia Lummis (R-Wyo.) backed Block Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) CEO Jack Dorsey’s call for tax relief on Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) transactions on Thursday, citing a supportive legislation she introduced earlier. ‘De Minimis Tax Exemption’ Dorsey advocated for a “de minimis tax exemption” on everyday BTC payments, backing an argument that routine purchases, like buying coffee, shouldn’t trigger capital gains.
